ca.team3161.lib.utils.controls

Interface Gamepad

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LogitechDualAction

    public interface Gamepad
    An interface defining a Gamepad controller. All Gamepads are expected to have two thumbsticks, a directional pad, and some clickable buttons. Not all Gamepads will have variable triggers, and not all raw button or axis mappings are the same. These details are left to specific Gamepad implementations.

      Invert the Y-axes of the left and right thumbsticks

    • Method Detail

      • getBackingHID

        GenericHID getBackingHID()
        Get the backing input device of this Gamepad
        Returns:
        the backing input device, eg Joystick

      • getLeftX

        float getLeftX()
        Get the left thumbstick X-axis
        Returns:
        the X-axis of the left thumbstick

      • getLeftY

        float getLeftY()
        Get the left thumbstick Y-axis
        Returns:
        the Y-axis of the left thumbstick

      • getRightX

        float getRightX()
        Get the right thumbstick X-axis
        Returns:
        the X-axis of the right thumbstick

      • getRightY

        float getRightY()
        Get the right thumbstick Y-axis
        Returns:
        the Y-axis of the right thumbstick

      • getDpadHorizontal

        float getDpadHorizontal()
        Get the directional pad horizontal
        Returns:
        the left/right value of the directional pad

      • getDpadVertical

        float getDpadVertical()
        Get the directional pad vertical
        Returns:
        the up/down value of the directional pad

      • getButton

        boolean getButton(int button)
        Get the value of a button on the controller
        Parameters:
        button - which button to check. The mapping from values here to actual buttons will depend on the specific Gamepad implementation
        Returns:
        whether the specified button is currently pressed or not

      • setInverted

        Gamepad setInverted(boolean inverted)
        Invert the Y-axes of the left and right thumbsticks
        Parameters:
        inverted - if the thumbsticks are to be inverted
        Returns:
        this Gamepad instance

      • getInverted

        boolean getInverted()
        Check if this Gamepad's thumbstick Y-axes are inverted
        Returns:
        whether the Y-axes of the thumbsticks are inverted
